title: League won't open halp

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: It like this for both pbe and normal client, should i redownload or what?

replies.body: Thanks guys i ran this shit down as how i run it down mid, but as admin and it worked thanks
run it as admin and it works

This error is usually caused by an OS setting or security feature that's blocking the patcher from launching.  Your best bet would be to go over our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access and get back in game.  Let me know if you have any questions!
